contents:
#set the default value of jinping's intelligence
xjp_iq = 10
china_dev_speed = 0.3
#range of china_dev_speed is from 0 to 1

print('Welcome to the darkest time. Now you are a 反动分子')

while xjp_iq < 85:
    normal_economy = False
    freedom = False
    democracy = False
    ccp = True
    if democracy and ccp == False or xjp_iq > 130:
        print('Congratulates! You\'re now living in a democratic nation.')
        china_dev_speed = 0.8
        normal_economy = True
        freedom = True
        break
